content: featured on january 15 & 16 2009 calendar pages *sweet and pretty baby blanket with an adorable rosette motif patons yarns * materials patons astra 50 g/1 75 oz 7 balls of 02751 white - mc 2 balls of 02755 blue aqua - a 2 balls of 02753 sky - b 1 ball each of 02752 baby pink - c 02936 pale lavender -d and 02759 baby yellow - e *6 colors 14 balls total* size 5 mm u s h or 8 crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge gauge one motif = 3¾ ins \ 9 5 cm square make a total of 99 motifs 19-20 of each color sew motifs together finish with 2-round edging assembly diagram is provided in pdf download april 2006
